description: This is a Python script designed to analyze a video file, identify engaging segments suitable for short-form content, and extract those segments into separate video files. It uses external tools like ffmpeg and libraries such as agno for media analysis and agent-based processing.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured to analyze videos and generate insights.

classes.name: Video
classes.description: Represents a video file to be analyzed.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model used for analysis, specifically from the agno.models.google module.

methods.name: extract_segments
methods.description: Parses the analysis response to extract high-scoring video segments within the specified duration range and processes them into separate video files.
